i1.name: Way of the Hunter
description: {{sbc|Innate - Intent:}} '''Yone's''' {{as|{{sti|'''total''' critical strike chance}}}} is multiplied by {{fd|2.5}} from all other sources, but his {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} deal only {{as|{{critical damage|57.5|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}. Additionally, every {{as|1% critical strike chance}} in excess of {{as|100%|critical strike chance}} is converted into {{as|{{fd|0.4}} '''bonus''' AD}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Steel and Spirit:}} '''Yone's''' {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} alternate between using his {{as|Steel Sword|Steel}} and {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} {{tip|on-attack}}. '''Yone''' begins attacking with his {{as|Steel Sword|Steel}}, and basic attacks with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} deal {{as|50% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|50% AD}} {{as|magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Intent: Yone's total critical strike chance is multiplied by 2.5 from all other sources, but his critical strikes deal only (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage. Additionally, every 1% critical strike chance in excess of 100% is converted into 0.4 bonus AD.
Innate - Steel and Spirit: Yone's basic attacks alternate between using his Steel Sword and Azakana Sword on-attack. Yone begins attacking with his Steel Sword, and basic attacks with the Azakana Sword deal 50% AD physical damage and 50% AD magic damage.
i1.notes:
* The pattern in which '''Yone''' alternates between his two swords are: {{as|Steel}}, {{as|Azakana}}, {{as|Steel}}, {{as|Azakana}}, {{as|Steel}}, {{as|Azakana}}, etc.
** There is no attack time out between alternating swords.
*** It will ''persist through {{tip|death}}''.
**** Only {{ai|Soul Unbound|Yone}} will reset his next attack to restart the cycle.
* 50% of {{tip|Spellblade}} and {{ri|Demolish}} damage will be converted to {{as|magic damage}} if applied by the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.
** This will also occur if applied by {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit'' after having last attacked with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.
** This will also occur if applied by {{ai|Mortal Steel|Yone}} after having last attacked with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.{{bug}}
* The mixed damage is dealt in two simultaneous instances of damage, but will pretend to be a single instance for most effects (such as {{ris|Conqueror}} stacks).
** Both instances deal {{tip|basic damage}} and thus natively apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** The attack applies [[on-hit]] effects only once, right at the start.
** Even if the target dies from the {{as|magic damage}}, the {{as|physical damage}} will still be applied to it.
*** If the target dies from [[on-hit]] damage, the magic damage portion will be skipped and only the physical damage applied.{{bug}}
* '''Yone''' requires at least {{sti|{{as|40% critical strike chance}}}} in order to reach {{as|100% critical strike chance}} from ''Way of the Hunter's'' multiplier.
* ''Way of the Hunter'' will multiply '''Yone's''' {{stil|critical strike chance}} '''after''' {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} {{nie|Wrath}} is calculated.

q1.name: Mortal Steel
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' thrusts his {{as|Steel Sword}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and applying {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. ''Mortal Steel's'' damage can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|47|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Mortal Steel'' hits an enemy with the thrust, '''Yone''' gains a ''Gathering Storm'' [[stack]] for 6 seconds, which refreshes upon receiving the second stack.

While '''Yone''' has two stacks of ''Gathering Storm'', the effect of ''Mortal Steel'' changes: the stacks are consumed to cause '''Yone''' to {{tip|dash}} a fixed distance in the target direction and unleash a whirlwind that advances in the same direction. The dash and the whirlwind both deal the same amount of damage to all enemies hit in their path and {{tip|airborne|knock them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, but they cannot affect the same target twice.

{{tt|''Mortal Steel's'' thrust|Not when at two stacks}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} if '''Yone''' is affected by {{tip|disarming crowd control}} during the cast time but its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset to {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yone thrusts his Steel Sword in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and applying on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. Mortal Steel's damage can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage.
If Mortal Steel hits an enemy with the thrust, Yone gains a Gathering Storm stack for 6 seconds, which refreshes upon receiving the second stack.
While Yone has two stacks of Gathering Storm, the effect of Mortal Steel changes: the stacks are consumed to cause Yone to dash a fixed distance in the target direction and unleash a whirlwind that advances in the same direction. The dash and the whirlwind both deal the same amount of damage to all enemies hit in their path and knock them up for 0.75 seconds, but they cannot affect the same target twice.
Mortal Steel's thrust is interrupted if Yone is affected by disarming crowd control during the cast time but its cooldown is reset to 0.1 seconds.
q1.notes:
* ''Mortal Steel'' is not affected by {{ai|Way of the Hunter|Yone}}.
* ''Mortal Steel'' applies {{tip|basic damage}} for {{tt|the first (closest) enemy hit|including enemies hit by the dash}} and {{tip|area damage}} for secondary enemies:
** ''Mortal Steel'' will apply [[on-hit]] effects to the first target hit, but will not do so to the secondary ones.
** ''Mortal Steel'' will not apply [[ability effects|spell effects]] to the first target hit, but will do so to the secondary ones.
** {{stil|Spell vamp}} will only grant {{tip|heal|healing}} from the damage dealt to secondary targets, and healing is reduced to 33% effectiveness, accordingly.
** {{stil|Life steal}} will heal based on the damage dealt to the first target hit.
* ''Mortal Steel'' will not benefit from the bonus attack speed gained by {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.{{bug}}
* After a successful crit roll against one of the targets, ''Mortal Steel's'' thrust is guaranteed to {{tip|critically strike}} all further targets aswell.{{bug}}
** This is unlike the behaviour of {{cai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo}}.
** The whirlwind and dash roll their critical strike against each target individually.
* {{tip|Blink|Blinking}} during ''Mortal Steel's'' cast with two stacks of ''Gathering Storm'' (after the cast time) will end the dash prematurely but enemies in range of '''Yone''' at the new location are affected. The whirlwind's trajectory cannot be changed once it has already been unleashed.
* Only the whirlwind can be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* Each parry has different interactions with this ability, whether it's the first target of ''Mortal Steel'' or the secondary one. In either case '''Yone''' still gains a stack of ''Gathering Storm'' and his whirlwind {{tip|airborne|knock up}} cannot be negated by parries:
** {{tip|Dodge}} and {{tip|Block}}: first target '''does not''' take damage, secondary target '''does''' take damage.
** {{tip|Blind}}: both first target and secondary target take damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Yone''' from receiving a stack.
* ''Mortal Steel'' is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} if '''Yone''' has two stacks of ''Gathering Storm''.
* While at two stacks, a range indicator will be shown for the effective range of the whirlwind.
* The {{tip|dash}} can cross terrain.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** '''Yone''' will always cast ''Mortal Steel'' in his facing direction, and he will turn to face the target direction at the start of the cast time. While at two stacks, '''Yone''' will always cast it in the target direction.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '4,4,4,4,4' as '4'

w1.name: Spirit Cleave
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' cleaves with his {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} in a cone in the target direction, dealing equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage to all enemies within the area. The '''total''' mixed damage has a minimum threshold of {{pp|30+10*x for 8;then + 20*x for 5;then + 40*x for 5|formula=30 + 10 per level until lvl 8, then + 20 per level until lvl 13, then + 40 per level}} against {{tip|minions}} and a maximum threshold of {{pp|140+10*x for 18|formula=140 + 10 per level}} against {{tip|monsters}}.

'''Yone''' {{tip|shield|shields}} himself for {{pp|35 to 55}} {{as|(+ 55% '''bonus''' AD)}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds if ''Spirit Cleave'' hits an enemy, increased by 100% if it hits a champion and by 50% for each subsequent champion hit.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yone cleaves with his Azakana Sword in a cone in the target direction, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage to all enemies within the area. The total mixed damage has a minimum threshold of 30+10*x for 8;then + 20*x for 5;then + 40*x for 5 − undefined (based on level) against minions and a maximum threshold of 140+10*x for 18 − undefined (based on level) against monsters.
Yone shields himself for 35 − 55 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) for 1.5 seconds if Spirit Cleave hits an enemy, increased by 100% if it hits a champion and by 50% for each subsequent champion hit.
leveling: {{st|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ {{ap|11 to 15}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5.5 to 7.5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Magic Damage|{{ap|5 to 25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5.5 to 7.5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '16,16,16,16,16' as '16'

effects.str:
• Total Mixed Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)
  • Physical Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)
  • Magic Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)

e1.name: Soul Unbound
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction, discarding his body and entering ''Spirit Form'' for 5 seconds. '''Yone's''' body is {{tip|untargetable}} and is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain, and is taken back by him when ''Soul Unbound'' ends.

{{sbc|Spirit Form:}} '''Yone''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}}, gains {{as|{{pp|10 to 30 for 11|0 to 3|key=%|type=time active|label1=time since the start of the dash|label=bonus movement speed}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and ''marks'' champions damaged with [[basic attack]]s or [[champion ability|abilities]]. Each ''mark'' stores a percentage of the {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage that '''Yone''' deals to each of them with his basic attacks and abilities.
Activation resets {{ais|Way of the Hunter|Yone}} current state. ''Soul Unbound'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, and automatically does so after the duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Yone''' remains in cast time for {{fd|0.25}} seconds then {{tip|dashes}} back to his body, ending ''Spirit Form'' and detonating the ''marks'' on each champion to deal {{as|true damage}} equal to the amount stored against each of them. '''Yone''' is {{tip|displacement immune}} from the point of reactivation until the dash is completed and, at the end of the cast time, he will {{tip|cleanse}} himself from all {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects and {{tip|polymorph|polymorphs}}{{tt|*|Does not remove the accompanying disarm}} that were applied to him during the cast time as well as all {{tip|blind|blinds}}, {{tip|cripple|cripples}} and {{tip|drowsy}} effects.

The automatic recast is delayed if '''Yone''' is {{tip|attack windup|winding up}} a basic attack or is unable to recast ''Soul Unbound'' under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities.
''Soul Unbound'' will also immediately recast upon {{tip|death}} or entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yone dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, discarding his body and entering Spirit Form for 5 seconds. Yone's body is untargetable and is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain, and is taken back by him when Soul Unbound ends.
Spirit Form: Yone becomes ghosted, gains 0 to 3 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed and marks champions damaged with basic attacks or champion ability. Each mark stores a percentage of the post-mitigation damage that Yone deals to each of them with his basic attacks and abilities.
Activation resets Yone's Way of the Hunter current state. Soul Unbound can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and automatically does so after the duration.
Recast: Yone remains in cast time for 0.25 seconds then dashes back to his body, ending Spirit Form and detonating the marks on each champion to deal true damage equal to the amount stored against each of them. Yone is displacement immune from the point of reactivation until the dash is completed and, at the end of the cast time, he will cleanse himself from all immobilizing effects and polymorphs* that were applied to him during the cast time as well as all blinds, cripples and drowsy effects.
The automatic recast is delayed if Yone is winding up a basic attack or is unable to recast Soul Unbound under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities.
Soul Unbound will also immediately recast upon death or entering resurrection.

effects.str: • Damage Stored: % of damage dealt

r1.name: Fate Sealed
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' prepares a strike over the cast time, then ''marks'' all enemies within a line in the target direction, {{tip|knockdown|knocking them down}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second, as well as {{tip|blink|blinking}} {{tt|200 units|Can place him beyond maximum range}} beyond the center of the last enemy champion struck. If no enemy champions are struck, '''Yone''' {{tip|blink|blinks}} to {{tt|maximum range|Uses center range}} instead.

After {{fd|0.3}} seconds, wind then rushes along the same line, dealing equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage to ''marked'' enemies that are within the area and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them towards the location '''Yone''' blinked to and subsequently {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds when the displacement ends.
''The {{tip|stun}} ends prematurely upon the knock up.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yone prepares a strike over the cast time, then marks all enemies within a line in the target direction, knocking them down and stunning them for 1 second, as well as blinking 200 units beyond the center of the last enemy champion struck. If no enemy champions are struck, Yone blinks to maximum range instead.
After 0.3 seconds, wind then rushes along the same line, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies that are within the area and pulling them towards the location Yone blinked to and subsequently knocking them up for 0.75 seconds when the displacement ends.
The stun ends prematurely upon the knock up.
leveling: {{st|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|200 to 600}} {{as|(+ 80% AD)}}|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Marked'' enemies that are not within the area will not be affected by the second portion of the ability.
* If ''Fate Sealed's'' maximum range is inside terrain, enemies will not be {{tip|airborne|pulled}} through walls.
* ''Fate Sealed'' {{tip|airborne|pulls}} targets to the location '''Yone''' ''would'' {{tip|blink}} to, and not towards his current position by the end of the cast time.
* ''Fate Sealed'' '''can''' hit targets whose center is behind '''Yone''', if their {{tip|edge range|radius}} overlaps with the rectangle hitbox in front of him.
* Enemies are {{tip|airborne|pulled}} with 3000 speed.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* ''Fate Sealed'' will not {{tip|stun}} enemies that are {{tip|displacement immune}}.
* '''Yone''' can blink up to 1200 units + enemy [[size]], if the last enemy champion's radius intersects with the maximum range slightly.
* The mixed damage is applied in two instances, and the {{as|magic damage}} will be dealt first within the same game tick.
** If the {{as|magic damage}} finishes off the unit, the {{as|physical damage}} will not be dealt against it.{{bug}}
* '''Yone''' will {{tip|sight|reveal}} himself during the cast time if there is an enemy champion nearby.
* When striking against {{tip|spell shield}}, '''Yone''' will still {{tip|blink}} to the last champion hit even if they block the effects to themselves.
* The {{tip|airborne|knock up}} starts once the pull ends.
* '''Yone''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of performing actions for {{fd|0.45}} seconds after the cast time. All abilities that have been buffered during this time will cast shortly before the lock out ends.
** The following table refers for interactions while '''Yone''' is in cast time:
{{ct|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=revival-false}}

effects.str:
• Total Mixed Damage: (+ 80% AD)
  • Physical Damage: (+ 40% AD)
  • Magic Damage: (+ 40% AD)
